definitions.text: a dissolute man in fashionable society
degree of deviation from a horizontal plane
examples: the roof had a steep pitch

definitions.text: a long-handled tool with a row of teeth at its head; used to move leaves or loosen soil
move through with or as if with a rake
examples: She raked her fingers through her hair

definitions.text: level or smooth with a rake

examples: She scanned the newspaper headlines while waiting for the taxi
